subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Gambling
Computers and the Internet
Figure Skating
Hockey, Ice
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Internet gambling has surpassed $20 billion annually, so it is not surprising that the Vancouver Games are attracting bettors around the world.
